alert.note: Alert for Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 19 at 2:27PM PDT until March 20 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southern Nevada and southeast California. * WHEN...From noon to 8 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Sheep Range; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
